thread.title_full: Customizing iPhone App Plus Photo & Social

title: Customizing iPhone App Plus Photo & Social
text: Questions Business Summary For sale are two key mobile app assets from one of the top app developers in the market. First is a portfolio of apps and games that have produced $417K in revenue and over 2.7 million downloads. Second is a keyboard app with exclusive keyboards featuring social medial stars with over 400K downloads. Highlights & Key Assets: o One app peaked at #6 in the Overall Paid App charts on the Apple App Store with a total of 480K downloads. o Includes 16 apps for 7 social networks with a total of 730K downloads. o Includes 44 apps and games, ranging from informational and utility apps, to music and video playlist apps, to puzzle and adventure games with over 2 million downloads. o Keyboard app includes access to social media celebrities with a reach of 80 million fans. o No marketing being done, all growth is organic. o Lots of room for additional growth. This is a rare opportunity to acquire multiple high quality apps that are poised for additional growth with the right new owner. NOTE - Revenue number is annualized run rate based on last 5 months average. Financials
